title: NCLT set to pronounce ruling on Hinduja group's resolution plan for Reliance Capital
description: The bankruptcy court in Mumbai is expected to announce its ruling on Tuesday regarding the application filed by the administrator of Reliance Capital Ltd for the approval of its acquisition by IndusInd International Holdings Ltd through the insolvency resolution process.
